tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
A month ago, I got my tooth fillings done in Delhi. I was not comfortable with the treatment, I felt sensitivity even after a couple of weeks, it then started paining and then lead to severely throbbing pain.

I had to travel to Mumbai for my exams and I was completely on painkillers  

I was in a lot of pain and that too in a city where I had no one. She indeed were a blessing to me. 

I found her clinic on practo and visited her, She analysed the whole situation and made me comfortable throughout the whole process.

While i was hopping clinics, Everyone suggested me to go for a immediate root canal, She on the other saw a possibility that the pain can be reduced even without root canal, She educated me with how and why the pain was occurring.     

I am off painkillers the day I came from the clinic.

My pain is gone! I can finally eat now, I cannot describe in words how blessed i am to have entered your clinic. 

Thank you so so much, forever grateful for your help.üëè
reply_text: Thank you Sarthak for the kind words

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Aditi did a fantastic job and made me feel so comfortable during the treatment. She went out of her way to make sure everything was done properly and in time, and was patient with me as I asked her questions about the process.

She was professional, helpful, and thorough. She gave me great guidance and walked me through everything step by step during my treatment. Her assistant Krishna was friendly and helpful as well. I would recommend her to anyone who wants a personable and professional expert!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Anuradha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The ceramic crown which was refixed on 01.05.2022 at Delhi came out on 31.05.2022. Since I am new to city I approached her by searching net. After examining the cap she explained me the pros and cons of refixing same cap vis-a-vis putting a pors fiber and building up and fixing a new cap. Based on the advice we went for permanent solution to strengthen teeth. During procedure due to some complications the procedure has to be modified and she explained the reasons to undertake modified procedure. After taking all precautions finally the tooth has been restored functionally. This tooth has decayed abruptly and while doing RCT in May 2020 in Gurgaon I new that there is bone loss and it will be very difficult to restore it. 
But same could be achieved due to her experience, meticulous planning .
Deepak Tandon
reply_text: Thank you Mr Tandon for your kind words..
